name: Attack
description: Deal 1 damage to a player.

name: Backstab
description: Deal 1 damage to a player. Ignore attack limit.

name: Capture
description: Steal another player’s building.

name: Destroy
description: Remove a building and all copies of it from a player.

name: Heist
description: Switch hands with another player.

name: Sabotage
description: Discard 2 random cards from a player’s hand.

name: Spy
description: Reveal another player’s hand to you.

name: Defend
description: Block an offensive card used against ANY player.

name: Goody Bag
description: Draw 2 cards. Ignore hand size.

name: Goody Bag+
description: Draw 3 cards. Ignore hand size.

name: Barracks
description: Increase your attack limit by 1.

name: Farm
description: Increase your hand size by 1.

name: Fort
description: Discard to block all damage from a card.

name: Spell Tower
description: ALL players can use spells. Increase your ATTACK damage by 1.

name: Barrier
description: A SPELL TOWER must be present to use this. You cannot be targeted until your next turn.

name: Black Hole
description: A SPELL TOWER must be present to use this. Destroy ALL player buildings.

name: Blood Magic
description: A SPELL TOWER must be present to use this. Switch health with another player.

name: Nullify
description: A SPELL TOWER must be present to use this. Block ANY card played at ANY time.

name: Chosen
description: Defeat the Demon Lord.

name: Cultist
description: Slay The Crown and Knight.

name: Demon Lord
description: Exterminate all other players.

name: Knight
description: Protect The Crown (even if it kills you!)

name: The Crown
description: Eliminate all who oppose you.

name: Usurper
description: Execute The Crown.

name: Oracle
description: Reveal another player's role card. (Setup: Last card in the deck)
